member.name: T:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Program
member.summary: Sample console app showing how to read, query, change and save a GEDCOM file.

member.name: T:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step1LoadTreeFromFile
member.summary: Tiny sample class on how to load a GEDCOM file.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step1LoadTreeFromFile.LoadPresidentsTree
member.returns: A database reader that can be used to access the parsed database.

member.name: T:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step2QueryTree
member.summary: Tiny sample class on how to query a GEDCOM file.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step2QueryTree.QueryTree(GeneGenie.Gedcom.GedcomDatabase)
member.summary: Queries the tree for any individual with a name, just to show how to query.

member.name: T:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step3AddAPerson
member.summary: Tiny sample class on how to add a person to a database.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step3AddAPerson.AddPerson(GeneGenie.Gedcom.GedcomDatabase)
member.summary: Adds a sample person (well, a cartoon mouse) to the presidents file. The mouse may do a better job if elected president.
member.param: The database to add the individual to.

member.name: T:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step4SaveTree
member.summary: Tiny sample class on how to save a GEDCOM file.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Sample.Step4SaveTree.Save(GeneGenie.Gedcom.GedcomDatabase)
member.summary: Saves the sample database out to a new file.
